name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Petitioner v. James August LEHMAN, Respondent

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Petitioner v. James August LEHMAN, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 5th day of April 2005, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED, limited to the following question:
Whether the detention and boarding of respondent’s vessel was valid under the Fourth Amendment of the United States Constitution and Article I, Section 8 of the Pennsylvania Constitution?
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
871 A.2d 790
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Petitioner v. James August LEHMAN, Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 5, 2005.
